name: 'Huggy Toons'
description:
This game was made for the WOWIE! Jam 4.0. The theme of the Jam is "colaborate with the AI"

Story: Once upon a time there was a silly fox  called Huggy who met an artificial intelligence that came from the future. The little robot teaches the fox how to make friends and be the best neigborino.

How to play: Use 'A' and 'D' to move left and right. Use the "Space Bar" to jump and "E" to interact. Follow the AI advices.
